top_tweets.text: This afternoon, I toured POET Bioprocessing — a biofuel plant in Iowa. We want to see facilities like these all over the Midwest. They support farmers, create good-paying jobs, reduce our reliance on foreign oil, and give you a choice at the pump. https://t.co/M9JnxiZsNG

1/ Secretary Yellen’s latest public remarks are nothing short of remarkable.

Here, the top US govt official in charge of the financial system talks about Satoshi Nakamoto's innovation:

“New technology has raised the possibility of reduced reliance on centralized intermediaries” https://t.co/rAG7txHTLl

Every so often you have to remind yourself that the UK is one of the richest nations on Earth. To reach this point - of such wide reliance on foodbanks - required years of extreme mismanagement, pointless cuts in services and concentration of wealth. 
https://t.co/mB4BOtRb43

We've set out our bold new plans to tackle illegal migration, control our borders & crack down on the people-smuggling trade:

🇬🇧🤝🇷🇼 New international migration partnership
✅ Military command to tackle small boats crossings.
✅ New asylum centres.
✅ Ending reliance on hotels. https://t.co/oPZ6MDuDzz

“It’s not that I am trying to do social engineering around people using bikes, walking & transit. I am trying to undo the 60+ years of social engineering around the complete reliance on the automobile.” — well said @gabe_klein. #cardependency https://t.co/W4cLQILkCe
We all must condemn Putin’s horrific acts of cruelty. But to stop the war, we also must end our reliance on Russian energy resources. It’s the only way. https://t.co/BLy0xtCbWB

Look at how Somaliland moved swiftly to mobilise funds to help victims of market fire. 

In just two weeks, 988 victims identified, 1.8m USD disbursed and more to come.

Impressive show of what a functional order, social cohesion, self-reliance and mutual solidarity can achieve. https://t.co/1Sm3ogCBK9

US vs. EU in a nutshell:

US treasury secretary Janet Yellen -
“New technology has raised the possibility of reduced reliance on centralized intermediaries”

ECB president Christine Lagarde -
"Cryptocurrencies are highly speculative and suspicious" https://t.co/f95ebQVLBs

For the first time in 22 years, Greece will start exploration of local natural gas deposits to cut reliance on🇷🇺energy,🇬🇷PM announced

🇬🇷had such plans before but low crude prices in previous years, lack of political will,shift to green energy stalled them https://t.co/N2crsY2vff

Held delightful interaction with officials of Agriculture deptt. during my felicitation programme in Sanjenthong, Imphal.

Addressed the esteemed members present at ceremony & emphasized upon realising Adarniya PM @narendramodi Ji's vision of self-reliance in #Agriculture sector. https://t.co/A7QtsLAbqV

Europe has committed to weaning itself off Russian fossil fuels. But the solution is not replacing it with U.S. gas – it's ending our reliance on fossil fuels completely by switching to 100% clean energy. https://t.co/BTjtcimgDN
